title: As an EBIS User, I want to see Disclaimer Text to CSP/CEP School Profiles
custom_steps:
AC:

* Add the following disclaimer text to CSP/CEP School Profiles:
** Note: Before making any CSP/CEP payments or reimbursements to this educational institution, whether on behalf of or directly to a player (active or inactive), we strongly encourage your Club to consult with qualified legal professionals to ensure compliance with any and all applicable local, state, federal, and/or international laws, rules or regulations, including, e.g., OFAC Regulations related to schools or programs in certain foreign countries (e.g., Cuba, Venezuela, etc.).
* Also display the text on the Edit mode of Invoices
** The text should display whenever someone is trying to add a new invoice or edit an invoice
* The text should be Black, Bold, in 12pt Font
* See attached:

title: Replace SCAT Documents in EBIS
custom_steps:
* Replace SCAT5 in EBIS with SCAT6
** Replace English and Spanish versions
* To find in EBIS: Go to Reports, filter for SCAT
* See attached:

title: As a Draft Ops User, I want to be notified when a draft contract is terms submitted
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a contract is submitted during the Rule 4 Signing Period (7/13-8/25 - system dates) for players that went through the drafted (any signings that would hit the Rule 4 Signing Bonus utility) will generate a new notification:
** Notification: [ORG Code] has submitted terms for [Player Roster First + Player Last] with a bonus of [Bonus Amount].
** Bucket: Minor Contracts
** High priority: No
** Slack: Yes
** Slack Channel: _________________________
** User Groups: Minor Contracts BOC Admin
** Link: Notification should link to the contract

title: Update School League Names in EBIS
Darken the text on the MN Summary Page
custom_steps: Make the secondary gray text on the MN Summary boxes black. Ensure that the column header text (Minors, AAA, AA) still remains prominent.

custom_steps:
_subject to change_

AC:

* The following text should appear on CSP/CEP School screens and New Invoice screens for players:
** Before making any CSP/CEP payments or reimbursements to this educational institution, whether on behalf of or directly to a player (active or inactive), we strongly encourage your Club to consult with qualified legal professionals to ensure compliance with any and all applicable local, state, federal, and/or international laws, rules or regulations, including, e.g., OFAC Regulations related to schools or programs in certain foreign countries (e.g., Cuba, Venezuela, etc.).

title: As a MNC Admin, Add Cs automatically created during Spring Training should take the higher amount of the Minimum or P2
custom_steps:
Related to: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBIS2-1754|https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBIS2-1754|smart-link] 

AC:

* When a player has an Optional Assignment or MJ/MN Outright Transaction approved, the system will automatically create a new Add C for the player using the system value of MN Min (No MLS) or the P2 salary, which ever is +*greater*+

title: As a BOC Admin, I want EBIS to send emails if a Club requests medicals on a waiver request
custom_steps:
AC:

* If a club clicks the 'Request Medicals' button, ebis will send one of two emails to emr@mlb.com
** If the rule check fails, the following email will be sent:
*** Subject: [Action Needed] Waiver Medicals - [Player Last, Player Roster First]
*** Body: The [Club] have requested Waiver Medicals on [Player Last, Player Roster First].  This player requires a criteria review.
** If the rule check passes, or if the waivers are Unconditional Release waivers, the following email will be sent:
*** Subject: Waiver Medicals - [Player Last, Player Roster First]
*** Body: The [Club] have requested Waiver Medicals on [Player Last, Player Roster First]

title: As a BOC Admin, I want allow Clubs to request medicals on waiver requests through EBIS
custom_steps:
AC:

* On the Waiver Request screen, there will be a new 'Request Medicals' button
* Clicking the button on an outright waiver request will run the following rule check:
** Did the player go 7 days without a game date in the immediately previous season OR did the player spend >=1 day on any IL in either of the two previous seasons
* There no rule check on Unconditional Release Waivers
* If the check fails, a hard error will be returned that says:
** Title: Warning
** Body: Player may not have met criteria for this request.  BOC will investigate and reach out to you with more information.
** Buttons: Continue

title: As an EBIS User, I want High Priority Notifications Removed After 2 Days
custom_steps:
AC:

* High Priority notifications will be automatically removed from the tray after 2 days
* The notifications will continue to be displayed in the Notifications clipboard widget

title: As an EBIS User, I want to Delete Notifications from the High Priority Tray
custom_steps:
AC:

* There will be a trash can icon on all notifications displayed in the High Priority tray
* Clicking the icon will remove the notification from the tray
* The notification will continue to appear on the Notifications clipboard widget

title: Add an "Other Bonuses" Section to the MJ Terms of an MNC
custom_steps:
AC:

* On an MNC, under Addendum B, there will be a new â€œOther Bonusesâ€� section under Major-League Terms
* When expanded, the section will mirror the current Performance Bonus and Award Bonus sections on the MNC
* The Criteria dropdown will only have the following option:
** Days on Major League Roster (Active Days)
* Any amount added to this section should be included in the MJ Terms Total Compensation count
* If the MJ Terms Total Compensation exceeds $4 million, the following warning message will appear on Submit:
** â€œMJ Terms Total Compensation may not be more than $4,000,000. Please contact the BOC for assistance.â€�

title: Add a FY Not Counting Filter to Adv Search
custom_steps:
Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/67a23e67438bee09dbb0f51f/screen/67a23e8bc0cf201fc918c310|https://app.zeplin.io/project/67a23e67438bee09dbb0f51f/screen/67a23e8bc0cf201fc918c310|smart-link] 

AC:

* On the Advanced Search in EBIS, a new option labeled 'First Year Not Counting' Will be available in the Filters dropdown under the Professional Players selection
* The actions in the Filters table will go:
** First Year Not Counting 'Equals' Yes/No
* The filter will look to the Baseball Info section on players' profiles
** If filtered to 'Yes' on Advanced Search, players with a Minor Contract under 'Terms Accepted' and beyond, marked as 'Newly Signed Player' on their profiles, and do not count against the Domestic Reserve List - will be displayed in the search results
** If filtered to 'No' on Advanced Search, any player with a Minor Contract under 'Terms Accepted' and beyond, not marked with the 'Newly Signed Player' tag, and do not count against the Domestic Reserve List - will be displayed in the search results
* When the 'FY Not Counting' count is selected on the new MN Summary page, it will link to this Advanced Search filtered for the relevant Org

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the Offered Amount to Match the Max Payable on MN Contracts if Applicable
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a Maximum Amount Payable is included on either a Performance or Award Bonus on a MN Contract, the offered amount should equal the maximum amount entered

title: CEP/CSP Updated Status UI
custom_steps:
Wireframe: [https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/67a671bbf064c2085cf09286|https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/67a671bbf064c2085cf09286|smart-link] [https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/67ad119f68b8d687bf32144a|https://app.zeplin.io/project/66312a0a2639c9bdc8c382c4/screen/67ad119f68b8d687bf32144a|smart-link] 

AC:

* When a playerâ€™s allowance has lapsed, it should be displayed in the status under the player name and in the Status row under the â€œScholarship Detailsâ€� section
** The date of lapse should display for each category (Living, Tuition)
* The Status of the player for either category should match the format displayed in the attached wireframes
** â€œLapsedâ€� will appear where applicable in a red tag with the lapsed date
** â€œCurrentâ€� will appear where applicable in a green tag
* When the allowance has lapsed, the Overview progress bar should be grayed out for the relevant category (or both) to indicate that the allowance is no longer active or current
** The date of the lapse should appear next to the Tuition Allowance/Living Allowance labels, if applicable 
* If the player has not been awarded either of one category, the progress bar will be grayed out
** The Status for that category should appear as â€œN/Aâ€�
* If a player has used up all of their awarded allowance of either category, the progress bar will show as completely filled, and a â€œCompletedâ€� status will display
** Note: This requirement is not reflected in the wireframe

title: As a BOC Admin, I want EBIS to Stop Automatically Removing Employees from Orgs
custom_steps:
AC:

* When an Employee Contract comes to the end of its term, the system will no longer automatically removing employees from the org
** The system will not create a â€œRemove Employee from Orgâ€� Transaction
* Clubs will now have to manually remove inactive employees from their organization

title: Custom Notification -
custom_steps:
When a Custom notification is sent, the Title, Body, etc remain after sending.Â  This is not impacting functionality  but could be a small UX issue. 

Potential options after discussion with Brian - 

* A clear button where it blanks out every field. (a reset button in other words)
* blanking it out automatically after sending but allow clicking a row to reload the info in case User wants to resend to another group or same user population. 
* Other suggestions?

title: As League Econ User, I want Club Users to view any MJC with a CT Date Entered, regardless of state
custom_steps:
AC:

* Club users with MJC permissions will be able to see any MJC that has a confirmed terms date entered, regardless of state
** For example, if LA has a MJC in Preliminary or Terms Submitted state, and the BOC has entered a CT Date on that contract, NYY will be able to view the contract

title: Notifications Overhaul
CEP/CSP Portal
Update the International Signing Period so that it consistently uses the same year as the period
custom_steps:
Currently, the system dates for the intl signing period are offset from the year of the actual signing period (see the attached screenshot).  We need to update these to make them the same year as the actual signing period / calendar year.

This will require ensuring that loading old data still loads the right period's information.



!image-20250115-201454.png|width=1574,height=1146,alt="image-20250115-201454.png"!

title: Add year parameter to Rule 5 API
custom_steps:
Add a â€œyearâ€� parameter to the [https://ebis.mlb.com/ebis2-rule4-services/|https://ebis.mlb.com/ebis2-rule4-services/Rule5/DraftDay/DraftPicks][*Rule5*|https://ebis.mlb.com/ebis2-rule4-services/Rule5/DraftDay/DraftPicks][/DraftDay/DraftPicks|https://ebis.mlb.com/ebis2-rule4-services/Rule5/DraftDay/DraftPicks] endpoint so the user can retrieve picks from any given year.

This will mimic the behavior of the [https://ebis.mlb.com/ebis2-rule4-services/|https://ebis.mlb.com/ebis2-rule4-services/Rule4/DraftDay/DraftPicks][*Rule4*|https://ebis.mlb.com/ebis2-rule4-services/Rule4/DraftDay/DraftPicks][/DraftDay/DraftPicks|https://ebis.mlb.com/ebis2-rule4-services/Rule4/DraftDay/DraftPicks] endpoint, which has a â€œyearâ€� parameter.
